attributes.action: Pursue Volkswagen to compensate UK owners of affected Diesel engines
attributes.background: Car makers VW scammed buyers by stating emissions were lower than they are. They recently compensated owners in the USA, costing them over £10 billion.  VW say they will not compensate European or UK owners as it would cost them too much money. They deserve to be prosecuted.

rejection.details: This is a commercial decision for Volkswagen, unless you have a contractual claim against the company.
